    • Method Detail

      • getCards

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCards()
        reset's score to zero and picks new cards
        Returns:
        ArrayList selectedCards is the array list that contains all of the cards that were selected for this game's file name. returns an arraylist size 16 that has been shuffled and made up of 8 pairs.

      • checkMatch

        public java.lang.String checkMatch(int checkSelcetedCardArrayIndex)
        takes the first card value and saves it. Then checks the second card if they match.
        Parameters:
        checkSelcetedCardArrayIndex - is the integer index of the array
        Returns:
        string message that ranges from empy in case of first card selected, Right or wrong depending if the card files matches.

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        returns the score to the user
        Returns:
        int score

      • checkHighScore

        public int checkHighScore()
        This function checks to see if the user has toped the high score
        Returns:
        y which is the index of highscores. 0 being first place and 4 being fifth place. Returns 5 if did not make it to highScores. also automatically assigns associated score name with score as "AAA"

      • changeInitials

        public void changeInitials(int place,
                  java.lang.String newName)
        Changes the highscore's name based on the place they ranked.
        Parameters:
        place - integer that denotes where they ranked.
        newName - string of new name they wish to change the score to.
